lyrics:

i will bid farewell
sever the ties
see killswitch engage liveget tickets as low as 89you might also likebridge

hoping for a change

i will never be satisfied
i will never be
i will i will never never be satisfied
i will i will now bid farewell

to all lies

sever the tiesembed
